kewpiedoll/re-intelliguy-re-kewpiedoll-r.author: kewpiedoll
kewpiedoll/re-intelliguy-re-kewpiedoll-r.body: @steemit is not a "user," it's the actual site itself. and this was the premier post akin to Satoshi's white paper. [See here](http://steemwhales.com/). I just thought it was odd the CEO would downvote the launch of the site he's CEO of.
kewpiedoll/re-intelliguy-re-kewpiedoll-r.title: RE: Welcome to Steem!

steemit/firstpost.author: steemit
steemit/firstpost.body: Steemit is a social media platform where anyone can earn STEEM points by posting. The more people who like a post, the more STEEM the poster earns. Anyone can sell their STEEM for cash or vest it to boost their voting power.
steemit/firstpost.title: Welcome to Steem!
